content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 77.4 - Safety and sanitation

State Regulations
(a) There shall
be adequate insect screens on all windows to be used for ventilation. (b) Domestic hot water shall be generated and
circulated at 110 degrees Fahrenheit without the use of thermostatically
controlled mixing valves and be equipped with a high temperature alarm
providing both auditory and visual signals having a set point of 120 degrees

Fahrenheit located in an office or other location normally occupied by
supervising personnel. Shower mixing valves shall be of the pressure balance
type. A separate source of hot water or booster heater shall be provided for
kitchens and other appliances and fixtures requiring temperatures in excess of
110 degrees Fahrenheit. Notes
